activities: MMIS, Inc. collects, processes and stores personal information for purposes of assisting its customers to meet compulsory and/or voluntary laws, regulations or codes governing transparency and other compliance reporting requirements relative to EU and EEA Member States as well as Switzerland.

personaldata: Personal Data Covered includes online, off-line and manually processed customer data
